name: Fitness Bootcamp
description: High-intensity group workout sessions designed to push your limits and improve overall fitness.
schedule: Monday, Wednesday, Friday - 6:00 AM to 7:00 AM

name: Yoga Classes
description: Relaxing and rejuvenating yoga sessions aimed at improving flexibility, balance, and mental clarity.

name: Personal Training
description: One-on-one training sessions tailored to your specific fitness goals and needs.

name: Strength Training
description: Focused strength training workouts designed to build muscle and increase strength.
schedule: Monday to Friday - 5:00 PM to 6:00 PM

name: Pilates Classes
description: Low-impact exercises that focus on strengthening muscles, improving posture, and increasing flexibility.
